metadata.title: CVE-2018-1000039 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
In MuPDF 1.12.0 and earlier, multiple heap use after free bugs in the PDF parser could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code, read memory, or cause a denial of service via a crafted file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-1000039` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mupdf - 1.13.0+ds1-1
mupdf-tools - 1.13.0+ds1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mupdf package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.13.0+ds1-1').
